entry.content:
🌐 Welcome to the Fediverse!

We're thrilled to announce our integration with the Fediverse - the decentralized social network that puts communities first!

🚀 New Features:

  • 🌍 Share to Fediverse: Share player achievements directly to Mastodon, Pleroma, and other Fediverse platforms
  • 📡 RSS/Atom Feeds: Follow our community updates in your favorite feed reader
  • 🤝 Community Connection: Connect with other positive gaming communities across the decentralized web
  • 💬 Open Standards: Built on open protocols that respect user privacy and community autonomy

🎮 Why This Matters for Gaming:

The Fediverse represents the future of online communities - decentralized, community-driven, and focused on positive interactions rather than engagement metrics.

This aligns perfectly with our mission to build positive gaming communities where players are recognized for teamwork, leadership, and constructive behavior.

"The Fediverse isn't just about technology - it's about building communities that put people first, not profit or engagement metrics."

🔗 How to Connect:

entry.title: 📊 Community Honor Code - Building Better Gaming
entry.summary: Our Community Honor Code promotes positive gaming behavior through four core principles: Focus on Growth, Constructive Feedback, Recognize Good Play, and Build Community.
entry.content:
🏛️ Community Honor Code

At Dota Player Rating, we believe in fostering a gaming environment where everyone can thrive. Our Honor Code guides every interaction and review on our platform.

⚖️ Our Four Principles:

🌱 1. Focus on Growth

Every player is on a journey of improvement. Rate and review with the intention of helping others grow, not tearing them down.

"We rise by lifting others up, not by putting them down."

🔧 2. Constructive Feedback

When providing feedback, be specific, actionable, and kind. Focus on behaviors and decisions, not personal attacks.

  • ✅ "Great map awareness in mid game!"
  • ✅ "Consider warding more defensively when behind"
  • ❌ "This player is terrible"

🌟 3. Recognize Good Play

Celebrate great teamwork, positive attitude, and skillful play. Recognition encourages more positive behavior in our community.

🤝 4. Build Community

We're all part of the same gaming community. Help create an environment where everyone feels welcome and valued.

🎯 Making a Difference

By following these principles, we're not just rating players - we're building a culture of respect, growth, and positivity that makes gaming better for everyone.

Join the movement: Rate with purpose, review with kindness, and build community with every interaction.
